column4: I have made a Samba shared folder. When I try to access it from  my Windows computer, it asks for a username and password. When i enter that, it just prompts again. What is going on?
I have made a Samba shared folder. When I try to access it from  my Windows computer, it asks for a username and password. When I enter that, it just prompts again. What is going on?
you'll need to add a samba account - "sudo smbpasswd -a <yourusername>", then use that username/password
